entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LATE THIS EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH LATE THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS AROUND 80

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
